nawatha goda basina wita kolombiya yanawa 2003 warshaye di winashayata path wiya. 1981 di mulwarata abhyawakasha shatalayak guwan gatha karana wita, 2010 wasara wana wita shatala walata wishrama laba dena bawa nasa aayathana wisin niwedanaya karana ladi. 2014 di eya oriyan namathi thawa yanawak prathisthapanaya karanu atha.
